resources.string: No host Activity found, please ensure you have at least one Activity open.
Please operate in the main thread.
The BasePopup has been Destroyed and cannot continue to perform show.
PopupWindow needs %s of DecorView\'s WindowToken, please check if DecorView exists.
The %s window is not ready, wait for it to pop up when ready
The %s window is ready to execute the popup.
The popupwindow\'s host has been destroyed
